sections.question: What is the classification of your data?
With whom do you want to share your data?

options.label: In and Out Of Syracuse University

sections.question: Do you need backups, snapshots or replication of your data?

options.label: I need one or more backup/snapshot copies of the data, and need to be able to restore data from previous points in time (high durability).
I need to have replicate copies of the data to minimize downtime (high availability).

sections.question: Do you have special performance needs?

options.label: I am likely to have more than 1,000 files in a single directory within two years.
My data interactions demand high transaction or transfer rates.

sections.question: What is the volume of data ?
